remarks: Elementhood of a preimage for a real-valued random variable. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2017.)
statement:
orrvccel.1 $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prob ) $.
orrvccel.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) ) $.
orrvccel.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
elorrvc $p |- ( ( ph /\ z e. U. dom P ) -> ( z e. ( X oRVC R A ) <-> ( X ` z ) R A ) ) $.
$d A z $.
$d R z $.
$d X z $.
